text: James Maritato (born March 12, 1972) is an American professional wrestler. He is best known for his time in Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW) and World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) under the ring names Little Guido and Nunzio. He is a former two-time ECW World Tag Team Champion, and a two-time WWE Cruiserweight Champion. ==Championships== * Chaotic Wrestling ** CW Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Luis Ortiz * East Coast Pro Wrestling ** ECPW Light Heavyweight Championship (1 time) ** ECPW Hall of Fame (Class of 2009) * Extreme Championship Wrestling ** ECW World Tag Team Championship (2 times) – with Tony Mamaluke (1 time) and Tracy Smothers (1 time) * Impact Championship Wrestling ** ICW Hip Swivel Towel Championship (1 time) * Jersey All Pro Wrestling ** JAPW Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Tracy Smothers * Pro Wrestling Illustrated ** Ranked No. 79 of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the PWI 500 in 2003 * USA Pro Wrestling ** USA Pro Tag Team Championship (2 times) – with Rahul Kay (1) and Kid Kruel (1) ** USA Pro United States Championship (1 time) * World Wrestling Entertainment ** WWE Cruiserweight Championship (2 times) == References == ==Other websites== *Nunzio's profile at WWE.com (archived) Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:People from Queens Category:Sportspeople from Queens Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling alumni
title: James Maritato
